description: Number of reversible strings with n beads of 5 colors. If more than 1 bead, not palindromic.
formula: "BHK" (reversible, identity, unlabeled) transform of 5, 0, 0, 0...Conjecture: a(n)=5*a(n-1)+5*a(n-2)-25*a(n-3) for n>4. G.f.: 5*x*(1-3*x-5*x^2+25*x^3)/((1-5*x)*(1-5*x^2)). [_Colin Barker_, Jul 07 2012]
author: _Christian G. Bower_
